mapper.select: select menu_id, parent_menu_id , menu_name, menu_url, orderby from TBL_MENU where parent_menu_id = '@'
select menu_id, parent_menu_id , menu_name, menu_url, orderby from TBL_MENU where not parent_menu_id = '@'
mapper.insert: insert into TBL_MENU(menu_id, parent_menu_id, menu_type, menu_name, menu_depth, menu_url, useyn) values (#{menu_id}, #{parent_menu_id}, #{menu_type}, #{menu_name}, #{menu_depth}, #{menu_url} #{useyn})
